titleStmt.title: To his sacred maiesty [sic], a panegyrick on his coronation. By John Dryden.
titleStmt.author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Herringman, at the Anchor on the Lower walk in the New Exchange,

notesStmt.note: In two states: state 1, pg. 4, line 18 has 'Not only king of us but of the year'; state 2, pg. 4, line 18 has 'Not king of us alone but of the year'.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
